channel.title: Blogging on John's Two Cents
channel.description: Recent content in Blogging on John's Two Cents

item.title: This blog costs less then 10$ per year
item.description: Yes, it is possible. You can run a website for virtually no money thanks to a couple of software and services. Actually, you don’t need a full fledged CMS for a personal website. A CMS is the abbreviation of a content management system and is a website that’s built around a database and forms to add content to the website. This means a lot of code that can be abused by not so friendly visitors.
